reqs:
Pre-reqs: MUSC 121 and one of MUSC 100, MUSC 110.
Must read music. It is recommended that students who take this course have completed MUSC 101 and MUSC 121, or if not, get approval from the instructor. Select MUSC 220 Lecture + one tutorial. Contact music.advisor@ubc.ca if you are unable to register. If class is full, register for WAITLIST, as available.

MUSC 220 Tutorial
description: The development of Western music from circa 1800 to circa 1900.
